content.en: Intestinal drug absorption: Algorithms are being used to study various aspects of drug absorption in the intestines. For example, algorithms are being used to investigate the transport of certain drugs in the intestinal membrane, assess the affinities of different drugs for transport systems, and develop models to estimate drug absorption in humans. These algorithms are helping researchers understand how drugs are absorbed in the body and improve drug delivery methods.
content.da: Absorption af lægemidler i tarmen: Algoritmer bruges til at studere forskellige aspekter af lægemiddelabsorption i tarmene. For eksempel anvendes algoritmer til at undersøge transporten af visse lægemidler i tarmmembranen, vurdere forskellige lægemidlers affinitet til transportsystemer, og udvikle modeller til at estimere lægemiddelabsorption hos mennesker. Disse algoritmer hjælper forskere med at forstå, hvordan lægemidler absorberes i kroppen og forbedre metoderne til lægemiddellevering.
